name: Qualitas Professional Services
goal: Qualitas Professional Services is an experienced and resourceful consulting company focused on helping medical device manufacturers and healthcare facilities strengthen their business through the development and maintenance of quality management systems, compliance to international regulations, and implementation of UDI solutions and programs. We provide training and consulting services on quality systems, FDA, MDR & IVDR compliance, labeling and UDI. We also conduct gap analyses, internal audits, and documentation reviews.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, International co-operation and development, Public Health
